comments:
I am most likley posting this bug in the wrong place but anyways...

When I am trying to run I get an error dialog and an error message in the error log.
This is on a clean 3.2m6-install with a new workspace.
I create one standard java project, with one package, one class and rightclick in it and choose run as java application.
I also get a similar (jvm launching error) error when trying to use the Visual editor (in a fully loaded eclipse).
I also get the same error when launching jUnit-tests in other workspaces.
Applications do start when run but no console seems to be connected.

It works just fine in eclipse 3.1.2.

It just struck me that I have't tried a reboot yet :) Will report back on this later today but since it works in 3.1.2 that should not help.

---------
eclipse.buildId=I20060331-2000
java.version=1.5.0_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=sv_SE
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86

Error
2006-04-10 07:48:11.506
An internal error occurred during: "Launching".

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6
at com.ibm.icu.util.Calendar.formatHelper(Calendar.java:3069)
at com.ibm.icu.util.Calendar.getDateTimeFormat(Calendar.java:3020)
at com.ibm.icu.text.DateFormat.get(DateFormat.java:943)
at com.ibm.icu.text.DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(DateFormat.java:736)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.launching.StandardVMRunner.renderProcessLabel(StandardVMRunner.java:47)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.launching.StandardVMRunner.run(StandardVMRunner.java:252)
at org.eclipse.jdt.launching.JavaLaunchDelegate.launch(JavaLaunchDelegate.java:101)

at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:565)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:771)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$6.run(DebugUIPlugin.java:961)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Jeff - do we have a component for ICU4J ?
CC'ing Darin, since launching triggered the offending call.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 134690 ***
bugs in ICU should go to ICU.  We just consume and reship the plugin
